SEARCH
Package inventory

Class ReplenishRequest

java.lang.Object
inventory.ReplenishRequest
public class ReplenishRequest extends Object
Represents a replenishment request for inventory items. Each request contains details about the item being requested, the quantity, the requester, the request date, and its status.

  • Constructor Details

    • ReplenishRequest

      public ReplenishRequest(String requestID, String itemName, int replenishQuantity)
      Constructor to create a new replenishment request. The request date is set to the current date, and the status is set to PENDING. The name of the user who made the request is set from the currently logged-in user.
      Parameters:
      requestID - The unique identifier for the request
      itemName - The name of the item to replenish
      replenishQuantity - The quantity of the item to be replenished
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no user is currently logged in

    • ReplenishRequest

      public ReplenishRequest(String requestID, String itemName, int replenishQuantity, String requestedBy, LocalDate requestDate, RequestStatus status, LocalDate approvalDate)
      Constructor for creating a replenishment request with all details provided. This constructor is used when reading data from a persistent source (e.g., CSV).
      Parameters:
      requestID - The unique identifier for the request
      itemName - The name of the item to replenish
      replenishQuantity - The quantity of the item to be replenished
      requestedBy - The name of the person who requested the replenishment
      requestDate - The date when the request was made
      status - The current status of the request
      approvalDate - The date when the request was approved or rejected

      public RequestStatus getRequestStatus()

    • getApprovalDate

      public LocalDate getApprovalDate()
      Returns the date when the request was approved or rejected.
      Returns:

    • setRequestStatus

      public void setRequestStatus(RequestStatus status)
      Sets the status of the replenishment request. If the status is APPROVED or REJECTED, the approval date is automatically set to the current date.
      Parameters:
      status - The new status of the request

    • setApprovalDate

      public void setApprovalDate(LocalDate approvalDate)
      Sets the approval date of the request.
      Parameters:
      approvalDate - The new approval date

    • setRequestDate

      public void setRequestDate(LocalDate requestDate)
      Sets the request date for the replenishment request.
      Parameters:
      requestDate - The new request date

    • setRequestedBy

      public void setRequestedBy(String requestedBy)
      Sets the name of the person who requested the replenishment.
      Parameters:
      requestedBy - The name of the requester

    • getRequestInfo

      public String getRequestInfo()
      Returns a string representation of the replenish request with all its details.
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing the request's information
